title: Boma - Flavors of Africa
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, International, Buffet, African, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Please inform your waiter that you are vegan and the chef will gladly show you around the buffet. If necessary, specially-prepared dishes will be provided when there are not enough options. Inquire about breakfast items before going as the above applies to dinner only.
